title: Calories in BJ's Pizza
meta_description: Learn calories in BJ's pizza per slice, including full nutrition facts, macros, and variations for BJ's deep dish favorites.
assumptions: 1 slice of medium deep dish cheese pizza from BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse; standard crust, no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact recipe, portion size, and customizations. Check BJ's menu or app for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One slice of BJ's deep dish cheese pizza has about 380 kcal and 14 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with restaurant info.

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of BJ's pizza?
faqs.a: Approximately 380 kcal for a cheese deep dish slice.

faqs.q: What are the macros in BJ's pizza calories?
faqs.a: Per slice: 42 g carbs, 14 g protein, 18 g fat.

faqs.q: Does BJ's pizza have high sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 800 mg per slice due to cheese and crust.

faqs.q: How do toppings affect calories in BJ's pizza?
faqs.a: Meats add 50+ kcal; veggies reduce by 20-30 kcal per slice.

faqs.q: Calories in a whole BJ's deep dish pizza?
faqs.a: A medium has 8 slices, so roughly 3,040 kcal total.
